title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and forage cap with canteen] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and forage cap with canteen] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.4 x 8.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Rinhart, no. 135 variant. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Published: O'Donnell, Mike, U. S. Army and militia canteens, 1775-1910. Alexandria, Va.: O'Donnell Publications, 2008, p. 180. Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Canteens--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
